title: New: COMPNY – Something Had To Give
body:
Rising from the ashes of ….

. (we’ll let you work that one out for yourselves), ‘mysterious’ UK outfit **COMPNY** follow up their debut Begging Me To Come Back with their second offering, the equally epic and radio ready, _Something Had To Give_. Usually I’d be put off by claims that the group are part of ‘collective’, creating “music, video content and fashion and artwork”, but when the songs are this epic, it’s difficult to turn it down. Check out Something Had To Give below.
